sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_warning_message_script" table="u_sp_instance_completion_task"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	// Add your code here
	return '';  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Warning message script</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value>(function warnMessage(){

    /* The return value of this function will determine what the warning
     * message will be. Simply return a string from this function and it will
      be shown below the title of the completion task. */

    var message = 'Warning message';

    return message;

}());</default_value><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_warning_message_script</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><internal_type display_value="Script">script</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>8000</max_length><name>u_sp_instance_completion_task</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-21 20:53:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c52a9b8d4f1a3a0022f40ccf0310c783</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Warning message script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_sp_instance_completion_task_u_warning_message_script</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-21 23:31:00</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_validation_script" table="u_sp_instance_completion_task"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	// Add your code here
	return '';  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Validation script</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value>(function isCompleted(){

    /* The return value of this function will determine whether to show the
     * "completed" tick next to the completion task. */

    var completion = true;

    return completion;
}());</default_value><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_validation_script</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><internal_type display_value="Script">script</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>8000</max_length><name>u_sp_instance_completion_task</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-21 20:53:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b7d8178d4f1a3a0022f40ccf0310c79e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validation script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_sp_instance_completion_task_u_validation_script</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-21 23:30:43</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-ct-heading: #117fc1 !default; $pe-ct-warning: #d35400 !default; $pe-ct-arrow: #117fc1 !default; $pe-ct-completed: green !default; .pe-ct-item { padding: 20px 0; margin: 5px; padding-left: 25px; position: relative; font-size: 25px; cursor: pointer; } .pe-ct-status, .pe-ct-arrow { position: absolute; top: 50%; } .pe-ct-status { left: 0; font-size: 20px; color: $pe-ct-completed; margin-top: -14px; } .pe-ct-title { color: $pe-ct-heading; } .pe-ct-warning { text-transform: uppercase; color: $pe-ct-warning; font-size: 13px; position: absolute; bottom: 0; } .pe-ct-arrow { right: 0; color: $pe-ct-arrow; top: 50%; margin-top: -16px; }u_sp_instance_completion_task{ "options": { "title": "Task title", "url": "?id=index" }, "data": { "completed": true, "warning_message": "Warning text" } }u_validation_script,u_warning_message_scripttruepe-completion-taskfalseCompletion Taskfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-04-21 20:00:16true52ddcf094f1a3a0022f40ccf0310c798135Completion Taskglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_52ddcf094f1a3a0022f40ccf0310c798admin2017-04-21 22:54:57
